00027 template< typename REQ , typename RSP >
00028 class tlm_delayed_transport_if : public virtual sc_interface {
00029  public:
00030   virtual void transport( const REQ &req , RSP &rsp , sc_time &t ) = 0;
00031 };
00032 
00033 template <  typename REQ , typename RSP >
00034 class  tlm_annotated_transport_if :
00035   public virtual tlm_transport_if< REQ , RSP > ,
00036   public virtual tlm_delayed_transport_if< REQ , RSP >
00037 {
00038 public:
00039   using tlm_transport_if<REQ, RSP>::transport;
00040   using tlm_delayed_transport_if<REQ, RSP>::transport;
00041 };
